thread.title: John M Groves
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by John M Groves

author: John M Groves
title: John M Groves
text: Eagle Optics is the place to go for anything optical. I have been a customer for many years now and count on them for good advice. The staff is knowledgable and helpful. Not long ago I was ready to order a Swarovski scope. The staff member I spoke to moved me in the the direction of a Kowa scope with a bigger objective lens for less money. I am very happy with it. Customer service is excellent.
